name: Fish Adventure
description:
Welcome to an endless ocean adventure game called 'Fish Adventure'! Play as a cute and adventurer fish with a peaceful mindset and divulge into the ocean.

Collect as many coins as you can, score as much as you can and the most important part is : Have Fun and Become Calm and Stress-Free while playing this!

Currently, there are three different colored fishes you can unlock using the coins you collect during the game. But, we are planning to add more fishes along with some more things like head-starts, etc. in the game. So, if you liked the game, please stay tuned and let us know in the comments if you liked this game.

FEATURES :

  • Endless Gameplay Mechanic with Challenging Obstacles and other parts as you move further in the game
  • New Characters available to unlock using the coins you collect during the Gameplay
  • Highscore Mechanism
  • PowerUps Available inside the Game to help you move on

CREDITS :

Game Develpoed by : Vaibhav Kumar

Assets :

Audio :
1) Sounds from Zapsplat.com
2) Main Music : {Original Name : Oniku Loop2, Music From : DL-Sounds.com}

Images and Sprites:
1) Coral Background : From Freepik.com, https://www.freepik.com/vectors/water
2) Coral Obstacles : By Ryzom MMORPG, https://www.flickr.com/photos/ryzom/
3) Select and Unlock Icon : From findicons.com
4) Logo, Fishes Sprites, Water, Coins, Power-Ups and Clouds : By Vaibhav Kumar

Thanks a lot for playing :)
